channel.title: Need Webclient designer, forums designer and all coders!
channel.description:
Dear fellow moparscapers,
I dont know if any of you are mad about the RuneScape economy and game but I sure am mad about the wildy remove from 2007. If anyone wants to help make This server almost exactly like how rs was back in the 317 version (with correct autospawn, 100% all skills, economy, nice wildy pking, +More) then add me on Msn - Gacoa@live.com and we can make the best server ever! I accept all willing coders (idc if we get 100+coders) but whatever makes the BEST SERVER EVER, And you can be apart of it! with 1000+ players
2nd: I need someone that is VERY good at Coding clients for I don't do much client code such as GodSword stances Vengeance GFX/emotes godsword specs attacks running walking and anything thay u can do just add me... again at Gacoa@live.com
3rd: Website/forums designer WebClient Forums and anything else u can do.. gacoa@live.com

item.title: Need Webclient designer, forums designer and all coders!
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

This section is for the development of servers, also all posts must be approved by a moderator first. Seeing as this wasn’t approved, and it’s the wrong section, I wouldn’t be surprised if you were to receive an infraction.

Read full topic
